alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:40AM EST until January 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of freezing rain are expected in the higher terrain. Total ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch are possible. * WHERE...The Pennsylvania counties of Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...Until 10:00 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
